system.name: Beautiful Ballet Rank 1
system.effect:
Your Pok√©mon with at least 3d6 in their Beauty Stat from Poffins may activate Beautiful Ballet as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves. X is the Rank of the chosen Move.
Rank 1: Captivate, Mist
system.prerequisites: Style Expert, Beauty as Chosen Stat, Novice Intuition
